Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS

Title: Relates to the correction of tax errors made by the nonprofit revitalization act
Summary: Relates to the correction of tax errors made by the nonprofit revitalization act.

ActClause: AN ACT to amend the not-for-profit corporation law and the religious corporations law, in relation to the correction of tax errors made by the nonprofit revitalization act
